author: nicko
msg: Added LocalSyslogAppender and RemoteSyslogAppender based on Rob Lyon's contribution.
LocalSyslogAppender uses libc calls to write to the local syslog service.
RemoteSyslogAppender uses UDP port 514 to send messages to a remote syslogd.

author: nicko
msg: Added support for adding new pattern converters during configuration

msg: Added comments and null arg checks
